I am a **Professor of Geographic Information Science at the University of Liverpool**, Deputy Director of the [ESRC Consumer Data Research Centre (CDRC)](http://www.cdrc.ac.uk) and Director of the ESRC Data [Analytics & Society CDT](https://datacdt.org/). My research is concerned with how the complexities of individual behaviours, attitudes and contexts manifest spatially, and can be represented and understood though a framework of geographic data science.

## Education

University College London \| London, UK PhD \| 2003 - 2007

University of Manchester \| Manchester, UK BSc in Geography \| 2000- 2003
